thread.title: Anthony Martial retains Manchester United starting berth for Europa League clash with St Etienne
thread.title_full: Anthony Martial retains Manchester United starting berth for Europa League clash with St Etienne

author: Aaron Flanagan
title: Anthony Martial retains Manchester United starting berth for Europa League clash with St Etienne
text:
Sport Anthony Martial retains Manchester United starting berth for Europa League clash with St Etienne Paul Pogba starts for United in the middle of the park, where he will come up against his brother Florentin Share Martial has kept his place in the United team (Photo: Man Utd via Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Anthony Martial has retained his place in the Manchester United starting XI. 
The Frenchman was recalled to the line-up for last weekend's Premier League win over Watford and keeps his place for the Thursday night trip of St Etienne in the Europa League. 
He starts in attacking midfield alongside Paul Pogba, who faces his brother Florentin, who plays for the French side. 
Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Juan Mata complete the forward line. 
Elsewhere, David De Gea takes up his place on the bench as expected, with Sergio Romero keeping his place as United's European goalkeeper. Paul Pogba will look forward to coming up against his brother (Photo: PA) Florentin even has a new haircut for the occasion (Photo: PA) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
